song_name: A Collection of Poems About Water
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, A Collection of Poems About Water is more basic than the typical song, having below average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: A Collection of Poems About Water has sections analyzed in the following keys: F♯ Major, E♭ Major,  and D♯ Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
